pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## Set Up Fleet# Install the SDK pip install fleet-sdk# Import the SDK at the top of your plugin's filesfrom fleet_sdk.fastapi import Tracker from fleet_sdk.flask import Tracker from fleet_sdk.quart import Tracker # Initialize the SDK with your Plugins Analytics's ID.tracker = Tracker("fleet-49b1bee7-b471-492a-a814-1bfbc2c2afa8", app=app)# Add this decorator to the endpoints you want to track.@tracker.log_event
